name: Vortex (itch) (AppleFruitGames)
description:
Vortex is a puzzle-platformer game where your goal is to reach the vortex in order to get to the next level. There are 10 levels with a steady increase in difficulty.

Controls are W and D or arrow keys to move around and space bar to jump. ESC to pause game.

Vortex is also my first game to be published. Hope y'all enjoy :)
